Base64Url.Description: Implements Base-64 encoding with URL and filename safe alphabet.

CheckType.Description: Checks multiple criteria for built-in .NET types (is nullable, is enum, etc.)
CheckType.ReleaseNotes: GetKeyword<T>() was moved to a different module named Atom.TypeName.

Parse.Description: Parses any string into different .NET built-in types using As<T> syntax.
Parse.ReleaseNotes: Prohibited parsing non-numeric strings like 'NaN', 'Infinity', etc.

TypeName.Description: Can generate user-friendly .NET type name and aware of C# keywords.

XConsole.Description: Extends standard console providing more features like colored output.
XConsole.ReleaseNotes: Added overloads for writing a single character.
